doc:
Desmond Nakano https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Desmond_Nakano 0 Desmond Nakano (born 1953) is an American film director, screenwriter, film score composer, and actor. He is Sansei, or third-generation Japanese American. He directed the feature films, White Man's Burden (1995) and American Pastime (2007). His writing credits include the screenplays for the dramatic feature films Last Exit to Brooklyn (1989), American Me (1992), White Man's Burden, and American Pastime. Desmond_Nakano ( born 1953 ) is an_American_film_director , screenwriter , film_score_composer , and actor . He is Sansei , or third-generation_Japanese_American . He directed the_feature_films , White_Man 's_Burden_(_1995_) and American_Pastime_(_2007_) . His_writing_credits include the_screenplays for the_dramatic_feature_films Last_Exit to Brooklyn_(_1989_) , American_Me_(_1992_) , White_Man 's_Burden , and American_Pastime .
